HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_1_TITLE: Saudi German Development and Investment Company Limited (SAGECO)
HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_1_PARAGRAPH: is a consultancy, advisory and project development company which was established in 1981. Originally came into being as a joint venture between the Governments of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Ministry of Finance) and the Federal Republic of Germany (DEG, Cologne).
HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_2_FIRST_PARAGRAPH: To provide clients with 'one-stop-solution' for all their management consulting, business advisory, market research and studies and regulatory requirements.
HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_2_SECOND_PARAGRAPH: To be the most recognized multidisciplinary research and consulting firm and strategic partner to our most sought-after clients.

EXP.TITLE: Experience and Know-How in Research & Consulting

ABOUT.BIG_HEADING: WEâ€™RE PROVIDING THE BEST consultancy, advisory and project development services.
ABOUT.SUB_HEADING_1: Saudi German Development and Investment Company Limited (SAGECO) is a consultancy, advisory and project development company which wasestablished in 1981.
ABOUT.SUB_HEADING_2: The Company originally came into being as a joint venture between the Governments of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Ministry of Finance) and the Federal Republic of Germany (DEG , Cologne) to promote cooperation between the Saudi and German private sectors and provide the requisite consultancy services. After expiration of the 25-years' mandatory period of the Joint Venture, the company was privatized.
ABOUT.SUB_HEADING_3: SAGECO's activities are governed by the Company's philosophy which is, to uphold the values of Integrity, Quality and Professionalism . Its services are carried out in a reliable, professional and cost-effective way.
